/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the surroundings. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves mostly bare, suggesting it might be late autumn or winter. A few resilient trees still hold onto their leaves, adding a touch of color to the otherwise monochrome landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, indicating a sunny day. The sun casts long shadows of the trees onto the road, creating a beautiful interplay of light and shadow. The image does not provide any specific details that could be used to identify the exact location within Beijing.
